name: Pizza Delivery Boy Driving Sim
description:
It’s time to play exciting pizza delivery driving game! Select multiple vehicle to drive across beautiful italy and be a pizza delivery driver. Complete your driving challenges, deliver pizza orders in time and Have fun in multiple car driving simulator.

Customers Are Waiting! Hover on your food truck to deliver pizza order with in specific time. This Pizza boy duty is challenging job! Take this Pizza Delivery Boy: City Drive Now and experience the crazy delivery duty of moto pizza boy. The goal is to drive multiple vehicle simulator including, racing car, moto bike, Exclusive Volocopter and deliver pizza to the customer at their doorstep as fast as possible. Here comes the ultimate driving simulation experience for all car driving fans who will definitely thrill with new idea embed in delivery pizza games and different from other then racing games!

Game Features:

• Exciting pizzas delivery driving levels
• Test your food truck, car driving skills
• Crazy traffic with extreme car parking fun
• Smooth controls for car drive
• Multiple Sports cars, delivery van for fast-food chain
• Complete all delivery pizza boy duty
• Exciting and Easy gameplay

Enjoy this latest drone Pizza Delivery Boy: City Drive. Take Pizza order, go with pizza maker, pack order and start your food truck simulator. There are number of vehicle simulator for moto pizza-boy other than food delivery games. Make sure client will get what they ordered! Follow the map to detect the customer’s location with delivery pizza motorcycle to prove you’re the super delivery driver! Make your customer happy deliver pizza and Earn cash on completing your task. Utilize your cash to unlock stunt bike, drone, volocopter and drive delivery van to get the destination on time. Have fun to polish your driving skills!
Drive as fast as you can to make the pizza order delivery on time but be careful with your food truck, delivery van driving and parking skills. Prove you are super Pizza man delivery driver and show your bike driving skills. Improve your profile by getting multiple rating stars on every delivery on time. This city Pizza Delivery Boy: City Drive provides realistic delivery driving of vehicles simulation in which you will have to drive safely and carefully.
